## "Industry, Innovation, and Policy in Uncertain Times"

### 2026 ISA Conference - Call for Papers

**June 3-5, 2026 | George Washington University, Washington, D.C.**

The Industry Studies Association welcomes research submissions from across disciplines with an industry focus for our 2026 annual conference in central Washington, D.C. Next year's conference celebrates the profound impact that industry studies research continues to have on both academic scholarship and public policy.

### Why D.C.?

Washington, D.C., the nation's capital and a global center of policy, governance, and strategic decision-making, offers an unparalleled backdrop for next year's conference. We will be in the heart of D.C.'s thriving ecosystem of think tanks, government agencies, and international organizations.

### Submission Types

We accept two types of submissions:

- **Single Papers:** Submit an abstract of up to 250 words
- **Organized Panels:** 3-5 papers with unified themes, preferably including practitioners

### Key Deadlines

- **Portal opens:** December 5, 2025
- **Submission deadline:** January 16, 2026
- **Decisions announced:** February 28, 2026

[**Submit Your Paper via Microsoft CMT**](https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/ISA2026/)

### Research Streams

Submitters select from seven categories:

- Sustainable Innovation, Energy, and Mobility
- Health Systems, Biotechnology, and Pharmaceuticals
- Innovation, Entrepreneurship, and AI-Driven Transformation
- Public Policy and Global Competitiveness
- Labor Markets, Organizations, and the Future of Work
- Operations, Supply Chain, and AI-Enhanced Industry 4.0
- General Industry Studies

### Conference Highlights

- **High-level plenaries** featuring leading researchers, policymakers, and practitioners
- **Research paper sessions** across key streams
- **Networking and professional development** opportunities for PhD students, junior faculty, and senior scholars

### Awards

Several awards will be presented at the conference:

- [**Dissertation Award**](awards-dissertation.qmd) - For Ph.D. defended between August 1, 2024 and December 31, 2025
- [**Giarratani Rising Star Award**](awards-giarratani.qmd) - For junior faculty and postdocs
- [**Best Paper in Innovation and Entrepreneurship**](awards-best-paper-innovation.qmd)
- [**Babbage Industrial Innovation Policy Award**](awards-babbage.qmd)
